step.cmd: Use the check boxes to specify whether you would like run a query for Consonant or Vowel harmony, or both.
Select the Directionality of the harmony pattern from the context menu.

By default, the query will return every potential case of harmony. To narrow down the query, enter a set of Shared Features and/or Neutralized features, separated by commas. (See for a list of features and shorthands used by Phon.)
